SEARCH

Uses of Package
com.financial.entries

Packages that use com.financial.entries
Package
Description
com.financial.data
Provides the data layer components for the financial application, focusing on data ingestion and persistence.
com.financial.entries
Contains the core data models for the budget management system.
com.financial.services.expenses
Provides specialized services and logic for managing budget expenses at the entity and service levels.
com.financial.services.revenues
Provides specialized services and interfaces for managing budget revenue logic, amount modifications, and state history.
com.financial.strategies
Orchestrates the execution of BudgetExpense adjustments using the Strategy design pattern.
com.financial.strategies.filters
Defines filtering strategies for selecting specific BudgetExpense objects.
com.financial.ui.views
Contains the various modular views and dashboards of the financial system.
  • Classes in com.financial.entries used by com.financial.data
    Class
    Description
    BudgetEntry
    Abstract base class representing a generic entry in the financial budget.
    Entity
    **Represents** a high-level government Entity (such as a Ministry or Agency).
    PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense
    Represents an expenditure within the Co-Funded segment of the Public Investment Budget.
    PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the Co-funded (Συγχρηματοδοτούμενο) part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense
    Represents an expenditure within the National segment of the Public Investment Budget.
    PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the National part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    RegularBudgetExpense
    Represents a specialized expense entry specifically for the Regular Budget.
    RegularBudgetRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry in the Regular Budget.
  • Classes in com.financial.entries used by com.financial.entries
    Class
    Description
    BudgetEntry
    Abstract base class representing a generic entry in the financial budget.
    BudgetExpense
    Represents a specific expense entry within the financial system.
    BudgetRevenue
    The base class for all budget revenue entries in the system.
    Entity
    **Represents** a high-level government Entity (such as a Ministry or Agency).
    PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense
    Represents an expenditure within the Co-Funded segment of the Public Investment Budget.
    PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the Co-funded (Συγχρηματοδοτούμενο) part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
    Represents an expenditure within the Public Investment Budget (PIB) framework.
    PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense
    Represents an expenditure within the National segment of the Public Investment Budget.
    PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the National part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue
    Intermediate class representing revenues from the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    RegularBudgetExpense
    Represents a specialized expense entry specifically for the Regular Budget.
    RegularBudgetRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry in the Regular Budget.
